resources.string: This are experimental features which will be available in the future, but you can test them now.
Enter the new password\n4 or more digits is recommended
You have no apps locked.\nDo you want to add some apps now?
You have not setup a password yet.\nDo you want to setup a password now?
Click here to disable the lock
When you enter the correct password, next password will be asked after a delay
When this option is enabled, you can access Locker by dialing #YOURPASSWORD\nThis means that if your password is 1111, you can dial #1111 to open Locker.
After this time the password will be asked again (Seconds)
Enter the password again to confirm
Draw the pattern again to confirm
If you like Locker, please support me by enabling ads
You can currently not disable ads
Time in milliseconds for the animation
You can exit an app and go back in the limit time without entering a password
Access Locker by calling to a custom number.
The number you have to call to start Locker (We recommend to start it with a #).
When this option is active, Locker will hide it\'s icon from the apps. You can remove shortcuts on your home screen manually (Requires reboot. Forces Start with call)
This only hides the notification icon in the statusbar
This message will appear when an app is locked
Background image to be displayed while unlocking apps
The number of attempts you have to enter the correct password
The time you have to enter the correct password
The color of the pattern circles
Don\'t show the error when you enter a wrong pattern
The number of rows and columns that the pattern has
Higher performance will be faster, but will consume more battery. Lower performance will be slower but saves battery.
Ask for a password again after screen is turned off
Show a notification while apps are locked
Start locking apps when your device starts
Change the position of the OK and Back buttons
The name of the wifi network
When you connect to a specific wifi network, (such as home), the lock automatically stops
Vibrate when you slide over the pattern
Enter the number of seconds after which the apps will be locked again
You can use %s to represent the app name
Time is in seconds, 0 is unlimited
All pro features are available and ads are shown
No pro features are available and no ads are shown
All features are available and you will see no ads
This is a pro feature. Do you want to enable Pro features for free?
You will lose all pro features\nAre you sure you want to change to free mode?
Your recovery code is %s\nIt\'s important that you send it to yourself (just in case you forget your password). You can find this code back in settings.
Your Twinone App Locker recovery code.\nTo be able to access your device again and reset your password, open the dialer and call the following number: %s
There is a new update of this app available. The current version will stop working in %d days.
This version is no longer supported. Please update to the newest version.
There is a new version available, do you want to update now?
The version you are using of this app is too old and needs to be updated. Please update the app to continue using it.
You need a password before you can lock apps.\nDo you want to setup a password now?
